com.eco.bio7.libreoffice

Class LibreOffice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.libreoffice.LibreOffice

  • public class LibreOffice
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an easy to use class for the transfer of calculation values from or to Bio7 from or to the LibreOffice calculator tool.
    Author:
    Bio7

      Returns if the spread has been opened.

      Creates a new sheet in the activated spreadsheet with the given name.

      • sheetInsertValues

        public static void sheetInsertValues(double[][] data,
                     java.lang.String[] head)
        Inserts values in the LibreOffice spreadsheet.
        Parameters:
        data - the data as a double array.
        head - a string array for the head of the data.

      • sheetInsertValuesMark

        public static void sheetInsertValuesMark(double[][] data,
                         java.lang.String[] head,
                         int[] sheetx,
                         int[] sheety)
        Inserts values in the opened spreadsheet and marks them at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        data - the data as a double array.
        head - a string array for the head of the data.
        sheety - the y-coordinates for the marks as an integer array.
        sheetx - the x-coordinates for the marks as an integer array.

      • insertText

        public static void insertText(java.lang.String text,
              int x,
              int y)
        Inserts text in the opened spreadsheet at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        text - the text as a string.
        y - the y-coordinate of the text.
        x - the x-coordinate of the text.
